description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 3/02/2006

Ridge rushes upstairs to see where Nick took Brooke. Nick declares his love to a shocked Brooke. Bridget along with Dante, head over to the wedding to tell Brooke that she is giving up Nick. All the guests at the wedding are surprised by Nick’s interruption. Bridget arrives to smooth things over with Brooke. Bridget tells Brooke its okay with her if Brooke wants to be with Nick. An upset Ridge tries to convince Brooke to go back downstairs and marry him.
